sentences.en: A furious player kicked his racket into the grandstand.
sentences.cn: 一位愤怒的球员将他的球拍踢向了看台。

sentences.en: He held a presidential review of the troops from a flag-draped grandstand built in front of the White House.
sentences.cn: 他在白宫前面的看台上检阅了部队。

sentences.en: It's shady in the grandstand and more comfortable for you.
sentences.cn: 汤姆:正面看台阴凉,对你比较舒适.

sentences.en: Kim Fonda said she also saw the plane disrespect toward where she was seated in the grandstand.
sentences.cn: 肯.芬达说在她坐的看台上，她也看到飞机向她横冲直撞过来

sentences.en: Ladies usually sit in the grandstand.
sentences.cn: 汤姆:女士们通常都坐在正面看台.

sentences.en: Our seats are in the grandstand.
sentences.cn: 汤姆:咱们的座位在正面看台.

sentences.en: Politicians will grandstand about remaking finance.
sentences.cn: 政客们会为重整金融体系而轮番上台表演。

sentences.en: Q . Have you played a lot on grandstand?
sentences.cn: 你在这个场地打了很多次么?

sentences.en: Q. Have you played a lot on the grandstand?
sentences.cn: 问: 你在这个场地打了很多次么?

sentences.en: She never misses a chance to grandstand.
sentences.cn: 她从来不会错过哗众取宠的机会.

sentences.en: Some swimming pools have a grandstand for people to watch races.
sentences.cn: 有些游泳池有供人们看比赛的看台.

sentences.en: The game was played to a packed grandstand.
sentences.cn: 比赛时大看台上座无虚席。

sentences.en: The gentry on the grandstand laughed too, though in a much more refined way, of course.
sentences.cn: 二门内看台上的观众也笑了, 自然他们笑得很文雅, 跟轿夫们笑得不同.

sentences.en: The grandstand and the match place are segregated by baffles.
sentences.cn: 球场的观众区与比赛区被挡板隔开了.

sentences.en: The grandstand was filled with men in seersucker suits, braces and pocket squares.
sentences.cn: 看台上的男士都身着泡泡纱西服，配着背带和西服袋巾。

sentences.en: Then why are we sitting in the grandstand?
sentences.cn: 那我们为什么要坐在正面看台 呢 ?

sentences.en: They are good ones , too . For the grandstand.
sentences.cn: 票挺不错, 都是大看台的座票.

trans.tran_en: a large structure that has many rows of seats where people sit and watch sports competitions, games, or races

trans.tran_cn: 做博取观众喝采的演技
